title: Did Trump Really Threaten to Veto the Stimulus Bill? (Ep 1421)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the behind the scenes strategy the Trump team likely used to box in Pelosi on the Stimulus Bill. 

News Picks:


President Trump takes a stand against the paltry “stimulus” checks. 

President Trump pardons George Papadapoulos.

The NY Times article discussed in the show about Trump’s appeal to immigrant voters.

NY congressman-elect compares capitalism to slavery.

Affluent families are ditching public schools. 

The Wall Street Journal article discussed in the show.

In this episode, I discuss the behind the scenes strategy the Trump team likely used to box in Pelosi on the Stimulus Bill.

  • The NY Times article discussed in the show about Trump’s appeal to immigrant voters.
